metadata.title: CVE-2024-8754 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab EE/CE affecting all versions from16.9.7 prior to 17.1.7, 17.2 prior to 17.2.5, and 17.3 prior to 17.3.2. Animproper input validation error allows attacker to squat on accounts vialinking arbitrary unclaimed provider identities when JWT authentication isconfigured.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
